General.Name: Zena Mining Corp
General.Description: Zena Mining Corp., an exploration stage company, explores for industrial mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for barite. It holds 100% interest in various industrial mineral rights that consists of nine claims covering an area of 300 hectares located in the Greenwood mining division of British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 3345 Huntleigh Court, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7H 1C9

1.Name: Mr. Kevin R. Hanson CA, CPA
1.Title: CFO & Director
